channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Urgent: Removal of Wet Leaves and Litter on King Hall Road, 28th November
item.description:
Could you please arrange for the fallen wet leaves and litter along King Hall Road to be cleared as soon as possible? The debris on both the pathway and the road is creating a serious slip hazard and poses health and safety concerns.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plastic fencing around cracked pavements pushed down, 28th November
item.description:
The yellow plastic fencing put in place around cracked paving stones over a week ago has been pushed over several times.i saw a dog walker this morning aggressively shoving it out of his way. It seems pedestrians think the owners of the property have placed the fencing there and are often irritated at us if they see us on our drive. We have been shouted at several times about the fencing obstructing their way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, St Paul's Wood Hill, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
